query: ANALYZE ctv_data
SELECT v, EXTRACT(year FROM d), count(*) FROM ctv_data GROUP BY 1, 2 ORDER BY 1, 2
SELECT v, to_char(d, 'Mon') AS "month name", EXTRACT(month FROM d) AS num, count(*) FROM ctv_data  GROUP BY 1,2,3 ORDER BY 1

v "month name" 4 num SELECT EXTRACT(year FROM d) AS year, to_char(d,'Mon') AS """month"" name", EXTRACT(month FROM d) AS month, format('sum=%s avg=%s', sum(i), avg(i)::numeric(2,1)) FROM ctv_data GROUP BY EXTRACT(year FROM d), to_char(d,'Mon'), EXTRACT(month FROM d) ORDER BY month
"""month"" name" year format year SELECT v, h, string_agg(c, E'\n') FROM ctv_data GROUP BY v, h ORDER BY 1,2,3
1 2 3 SELECT v,h, string_agg(c, E'\n') AS c, row_number() OVER(ORDER BY h) AS r FROM ctv_data GROUP BY v, h ORDER BY 1,3,2
v h c r SELECT v, h, string_agg(c, E'\n') AS c, row_number() OVER(ORDER BY h DESC) AS r FROM ctv_data GROUP BY v, h ORDER BY 1,3,2
v h c r SELECT v,h, string_agg(c, E'\n') AS c, row_number() OVER(ORDER BY h NULLS LAST) AS r FROM ctv_data GROUP BY v, h ORDER BY 1,3,2
v h c r SELECT null,null
SELECT null,null,null
v h i \pset null '' SELECT v,h,string_agg(i::text, E'\n'), string_agg(c, E'\n') FROM ctv_data GROUP BY v, h ORDER BY h,v
2 1 4 SELECT v,h, string_agg(i::text, E'\n') AS i, string_agg(c, E'\n') AS c FROM ctv_data GROUP BY v, h ORDER BY h,v
1 "h" 4 SELECT 1 as "22", 2 as b, 3 as "Foo"
"22" B "Foo" SELECT v,h,c,i FROM ctv_data
v h j SELECT 1 as "22", 2 as b, 3 as "Foo"
1 2 Foo SELECT 1 as "22", 2 as b, 3 as "Foo"
1 "B" "Foo" SELECT v,h,i,c FROM ctv_data
2 1 5 SELECT v,h,i,c FROM ctv_data
2 h 4 SELECT a,a,1 FROM generate_series(1,3000) AS a
SELECT 1
DROP TABLE ctv_data
CREATE TABLE ctv_data (x int, y int, v text)
INSERT INTO ctv_data SELECT 1, x, '*' || x FROM generate_series(1,10) x
SELECT * FROM ctv_data
INSERT INTO ctv_data VALUES (1, 10, '*')
